Text.Page:
I actually feel sorry for the {@LinkCreature:33#66#rotting prisoners}.

It's clear that they're shambling through the corridors here against their will.

, can you put them out of their misery and return their souls to the titans' Dream?

You've given them the peace of the Dream, .

Maybe someday we'll kill Thulsaâ€”and he'll descend into nightmare.
{@LinkCreature:33#66#Rotting prisoners} are below us in this horrible place, <PCNAME>. Put them out of their misery.
